================
**Invitation to Qualify**
------------------------ 

### Project Description
The [Department of Public Works and Government Services](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/index-eng.html) invites qualified contractors to express interest in the Wastewater Treatment Plant (WWTP) Upgrades project for the [Atlantic Institution](https://www.csc-scc.gc.ca/139/000004/002477-eng.shtml) in Renous, New Brunswick.

### Project Details
* **Project Number**: WS4549967381-Doc4549967455
* **Publication Date**: April 22, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 8, 2024, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: June 14, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A
* **Procurement Category**: CNST
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

### Project Objectives
The project involves the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment, and materials necessary for the upgrading of the Wastewater Treatment Plant, which will be completed in 52 weeks from the date of acceptance.

### Bidder Requirements
* Bidder must have a valid NIGP/UNSPSC code
* Bidder must provide a Certificate of Incorporation and a Certificate of Good Standing
* Bidder must provide proof of insurance
* Bidder must provide a detailed proposal outlining their understanding of the project requirements and their approach to completing the project

### Evaluation Criteria
The CFUTA (Canadian Fisheries and Aquatic Plants and Recreational Vessels Supervision and Management Bureau) will be evaluating proposals for Wastewater Treatment Plants as part of an IRB bid. A minimum of three qualified and experienced consultants with existing contracts and communications resources related to review of water plant comments requests where there is current activity.

### Interested Bidders
To express interest in this project, please register on the [Ariba](https://www.ariba.com/) platform and/or contact the following:

* **Department of Public Works and Government Services**, 11 Laurier Street, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Edward Johnston** ([edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca))
